name: Gitlab MR's
description: The Gitlab Merge Request dashboard gives a high-level view of merge requests opened, merged, and declined. It also provides with the insights of average time taken to close the merge request by repository and by reviewers.
title: Gitlab MR's

queries.queryString:
_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action , group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}"
| tourl (mr_link, title) as MR
| count by  action
| sort by _count

panels.title: MR Opened and Merged by Repository

queries.queryString:
_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}"
| tourl (mr_link, title) as MR
| where action in ("open", "merge")
| count by repo_name, action
| transpose row repo_name column action

_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where action = "open" and repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}"
| count

_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where action = "merge" and repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}"
| count

_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where action = "close" and repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}"
| count

panels.title: ‎Avg time to merge MRs by Author

queries.queryString:
_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.updated_at","object_attributes.source_branch", "object_attributes.author_id", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, updated_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| lookup GitlabUsername from path://"/Library/Users/prashanna.r@gmail.com/Gitlab/GitlabUsers" on GitlabUserId=author
| where repo_name matches "*" and action = "merge" and sub_group_1 matches "*" and sub_group_2 matches "*"
| parse regex field=create_time "(?<create_time>\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d)"
| parse regex field=updated_time "(?<merge_time>\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d)"
| parseDate(create_time, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as MR_Create_milliseconds
| parseDate(updated_time, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as MR_Merge_milliseconds
| MR_Merge_milliseconds - MR_Create_milliseconds as ms_to_close_MR
| ms_to_close_MR/60000 as mins_to_close_MR
| avg (mins_to_close_MR) as avg_mins_to_close_MR by GitlabUsername
| round(avg_mins_to_close_MR) as avg_mins_to_close_MR
| fields GitlabUsername, avg_mins_to_close_MR
| sort by avg_mins_to_close_MR

panels.title: ‎Avg time to merge MRs by branch

queries.queryString:
_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.updated_at","object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, updated_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and action = "merge" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}" and dest_branch_name in ("develop", "staging", "master", "main")
| parse regex field=create_time "(?<create_time>\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d)"
| parse regex field=updated_time "(?<merge_time>\d\d\d\d-\d\d-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d)"
| parseDate(create_time, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as MR_Create_milliseconds
| parseDate(updated_time, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as MR_Merge_milliseconds
| MR_Merge_milliseconds - MR_Create_milliseconds as ms_to_close_MR
| ms_to_close_MR/60000 as mins_to_close_MR
| avg (mins_to_close_MR) as avg_mins_to_close_MR by  dest_branch_name
| round(avg_mins_to_close_MR) as avg_mins_to_close_MR
| fields dest_branch_name, avg_mins_to_close_MR
| sort by avg_mins_to_close_MR

_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json "object_kind" as event_type
| where event_type = "merge_request"
| json "object_attributes.id", "object_attributes.title", "object_attributes.description",  "project.name", "object_attributes.target_branch", "object_attributes.created_at", "object_attributes.source_branch", "user.name", "object_attributes.state",  "object_attributes.url", "object_attributes.action", "project.path_with_namespace" as id, title, description, repo_name, dest_branch_name, create_time, source_branch_name, author, state, mr_link, action, group_name nodrop
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
| where action = "reopen" and repo_name matches "{{repo_name}}" and sub_group_1 matches "{{sub_group_1}}" and sub_group_2 matches "{{sub_group_2}}"
| count

sourceDefinition.query:
_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json field=_raw "project.path_with_namespace" as group_name
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2

_collector="GitLab - Sumologic"
| json field=_raw "project.path_with_namespace" as group_name
| split group_name escape='\',delim='/' extract root_group, sub_group_1, sub_group_2
